About Me

My name is Andrew Cutlip. I am a junior studying Computer Science at SUNY University at Buffalo. After my Bachelor's degree I hope to get my Master's degree in Computer Science as well. I hope to have an internship this summer to gain more practical experience. I also am open to offering my services online to anyone requesting them.
